message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product for sale. It's a high-quality item that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand that $120 is a bit steep, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. It's a great product and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
I'm still not sure if I can go up to $110. I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you meet me in the middle?
I can see you're still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $105, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great product and I think it's worth every penny.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $98, which is the lowest I can go.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $98. I can do $102, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great product and I think it's worth every penny.
